Bash(git -C /Users/joo/Documents/GitHub/ppt-translator commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix download 404 after cancel-retry by preserving cancelled jobs

Previously delete_job\(\) immediately removed jobs from the in-memory
store, causing 404 errors when retrying after cancellation. Now
cancelled jobs stay in store \(cleaned up after 1h\) and terminal state
guards prevent race conditions where complete/fail could overwrite
a cancelled state. Also handles asyncio.CancelledError in the
background translation task.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
